column3: str

What's that? Back to help us hand out some more eggs? You are far too kind, friend! Needless to say, we would more than welcome your aid. Here, I have a freshly decorated batch ready to go at any time!
You can replay the gift-giving task from the quest “Hippity, Hoppity, Happily.” If fortune smiles upon you, you may even encounter individuals who were not present in your initial venture.
Begin handing out eggs?
Where will you hand out eggs?
By the markets.
By the Botanists' Guild.
By Nophica's Altar.
By the Whistling Miller.
By Apkallu Falls.
A decorated egg? For me? How thoughtful!
There's even a treat inside! Thank you ever so much.
Your efforts are sincerely appreciated. These seasonal celebrations bring so much joy to the children─and myself, I confess.
Still, I must say...it's been years since I've seen a traveler rabbit in the flesh. I never would have expected to encounter one here.
What's that? That nomenclature is unfamiliar to you? Ah, in the North they are known more...colloquially...as “happy bunnies,” are they not? They're said to usher in smiles and good fortune...

Before that─yes, since much older times─they were known as “traveler rabbits.” They have a habit of showing up at your side unannounced, then vanishing off somewhere before you know it. I recall seeing one in the Twelveswood when I was but a child...
Ah, but forgive me... You have other places you must be. We can talk another time─pray relax and enjoy the festivities when your work is done.
Why, I daresay the wood used to fashion those decorations was among the finest I've ever laid eyes on. As always, your eye for quality timber is simply unparalleled.
You're far too kind, Master Bea─ I mean...my forest-loving, floppy-eared friend. Likewise, I have no doubt the wood rejoiced to find itself in the hands of one who understands it as well as you.
...Or should I say “paws”?
Ha!
Oh! If it isn't <Split(<Highlight>ObjectParameter(1)</Highlight>, ,1)/>! How good it is to see you well.
An adventurer? I don't believe we've met...
An egg for me? And what a charming little fellow carrying it. I accept your gift with gratitude.
How very clever you are! Though I did hear a rumor of some concern...
Yes, a little bird told me that creatures bearing no small resemblance to you were running wild through the streets of Gridania, trampling our precious greenery...
...And nibbling at the bark of our precious trees─a <Emphasis>most</Emphasis> disconcerting story if there is any truth to it.
C-Cluck! Cluck cluck! Cluck...
If my intuition is not mistaken, it appears the little creature is apologizing to us in its own way.
Well, as long as you've learned your lesson, I do believe we can forgive and forget.
Thank you for the thoughtful gift, and the happiest of Hatching–tides to you!
Greetings, <Split(<Highlight>ObjectParameter(1)</Highlight>, ,1)/>. It is always a pleasure to have you here in Gridania...and 'twould seem you've befriended some rather charming little helpers!
Why, what a lovely egg. How very kind of you.
And there's the most toothsome-looking little cake inside! Do stop by the Canopy when we've finished here─I've a brew that will accompany it perfectly.
I should enjoy that, indeed!

<Split(<Highlight>ObjectParameter(1)</Highlight>, ,1)/>, on behalf of all Gridania, allow me to thank you and your little colleagues for making this year's Hatching–tide so memorable. Once your work has concluded, I hope you will have time to relax and take in the cheer of the season.
You and your new friends are welcome to stop by for a cup of tea as well, should the mood strike you.
...Though I daresay you ought to claim a table sooner rather than later. These sweets will draw adventurers by the droves!
Well, if it isn't <Split(<Highlight>ObjectParameter(1)</Highlight>, ,1)/>! Fancy meeting you in a place like this!
What have we here? A decorative egg with a tasty treat inside? Hah! Thanks, little fellow─don't mind if I do!
Aren't you a cute one? And your fur is so soft and fluffy!
Thank you kindly, <Split(<Highlight>ObjectParameter(1)</Highlight>, ,1)/>!

Perhaps you're wondering what we're doing here? It's nothing so exciting, I'm afraid─just performing routine maintenance on the airships. Normally, we'd send our new recruits, but Wedge here <Emphasis>insisted</Emphasis> we volunteer for the task ourselves.
Stay home and miss Gridania's famous Hatching–tide egg hunt? Perish the thought!
Speaking of which...just who are these little critters, anyway?
Wh-Whoa! So <Emphasis>these</Emphasis> are the “happy bunnies” rumored to lead those they favor to happiness and good fortune!?
<squeak> <squeak>♪
What's that, little friend? Happiness lies that way? Could my dearest Tataru be here for the festivities, too? I must go to her at once!
Damn it, Wedge! Come back here!

<sigh> Fool of a Lalafell... I'd best round him up so we can start the repairs <Emphasis>he</Emphasis> volunteered us for. Anyroad, thanks for the treats─I look forward to enjoying them with a cup of tea when our work is done. Till next time, <Split(<Highlight>ObjectParameter(1)</Highlight>, ,1)/>!
'Tis an unexpected pleasure to meet thee here, my friend.
What will you say?
Urianger...?
A happy Hatching–tide to thee!
A most <Emphasis>egg</Emphasis>ceedingly <Emphasis>egg</Emphasis>cellent Hatching–tide to thee!
Why, <Split(<Highlight>ObjectParameter(1)</Highlight>, ,1)/>...however didst thou know 'twas <Emphasis>I</Emphasis>? Though mayhap my present company afforded thee a hint or two...
And a happy Hatching–tide to thee, <Split(<Highlight>ObjectParameter(1)</Highlight>, ,1)/>.
Verily, by simply exchanging these words, I daresay I can feel a measure of jubilation in mine heart.
Art thou quite well, <Split(<Highlight>ObjectParameter(1)</Highlight>, ,1)/>?
Ack! <Split(<Highlight>ObjectParameter(1)</Highlight>, ,1)/>'s found us! I wasn't expecting a reunion.
...Not that we're up to anything, mind you! We simply wanted to experience Etheirys's famed seasonal celebrations.
It's been an exemplary learning experience thus far. And I swear we haven't taken any samples that that anyone will miss!
To study such traditions is valuable indeed, for naught reflecteth a culture more clearly than what it hath codified in ritual.
...Pray tell, <Split(<Highlight>ObjectParameter(1)</Highlight>, ,1)/>─who are thy charming companions?
F-For me? Well, thank you so much! Er, I think...
Is this...a lemon muffin? <sniff> <sniff> But no...the aroma is entirely different.
Ornamental eggs and baked desserts? I see...thou art lending thine aid in spreading good cheer for the season. I am full glad to accept thy gifts.
...Pray forgive our haste, but my companions have much yet to see. A happy Hatching–tide to thee and thine.
Thanks for the treat! Why, I do believe I'll try to bake up a batch myself when I get back to my kitchen!
Till we meet again, <Split(<Highlight>ObjectParameter(1)</Highlight>, ,1)/>. Perhaps even purposely, next time!
